title: State of Play 2024 Full Presentation
description:
During PlayStation's January 2024 State of Play, we got a look at Stellar Blade, all-new Silent Hill games, Rise of Ronin, and the big reveal of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach. Additionally, Hideo Kojima announced that Kojima is working on a new stealth game.
#gaming #gamespot #deathstranding2 #kojimaproduction #dragonsdogma

title: Best PlayStation State of Play Trailers (January 2024)
description:
The first State of Play in 2024 kicks off with a bang!

Check out the best trailers from Sony PlayStation's State of Play January 2024. We get a new glimpse of Silent Hill 2, and an epic look at Death Stranding 2. See the timestamps below!

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Death Stranding 2 On the Beach

#sony #stateofplay#gamespot

title: Hideo Kojima Announces Physint and his Return to Action Espionage Genre | State of Play 2024
description: Hideo Kojima returns to the action-espionage genre with PHYSINT, a new project coming to PlayStation. Enjoy this short message from Head of PlayStation Studios Hermen Hulst, and founder of Kojima Productions Hideo

title: Death Stranding 2 On The Beach Official Announcement Trailer | State of Play 2024
description:
Death Stranding 2 got its first in-depth look during PlayStation's January 2024 State of Play. Sam Porter Gridges returns. Once again, he's not alone. But instead of having a baby as his companion, he has a weird little puppet guy. Higgs also returns in The Crow makeup armed with a guitar. The game is expected to release 2025.

#deathstranding2 #ds2 #kojimaproduction

title: Until Dawn Official PC and PS5 Announcement Trailer | State of Play 2024
description: Rebuilt and enhanced for PS5 consoles and PC – Until Dawn invites you to relive the nightmare, and immerse yourself in a gripping slasher horror where every decision can make the difference between life and death. Coming to PS5 and PC in 2024.

title: Rise of the Ronin Official Gameplay Overview | State of Play 2024
description: Team Ninja Game Director - Fumihiko Yasuda dives into exclusive Rise of the Ronin gameplay, captured on PS5.

title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Official Action Trailer | State of Play 2024
description:
Set forth on your grand adventure, Arisen!

Dragon's Dogma 2 arrives on March 22, 2024.

title: Judas Official Story Trailer | State of Play 2024
description: Ghost Story Games’ upcoming narrative first-person shooter Judas coming from the creator of BioShock. Will you fix what you broke? Or leave it all to burn.

title: Silent Hill 2 Official Combat Reveal Trailer | State of Play 2024
description:
In this latest Silent Hill 2 Trailer we get a look at new gameplay footage in this trailer, including what to expect from the improved and modernized combat.

Having received a letter from his deceased wife,
James heads to where they shared so many memories, in the hope of seeing her one more time: Silent Hill. There, by the lake, he finds a woman eerily similar to her...

title: Silent Hill: The Short Message Official Launch Trailer | State of Play 2024
description:
Fear Will Take You

Following messages from her friend Maya, Anita finds herself at a crumbling apartment block, infamous for rumors of suicides.
Drawn inside, Anita soon finds her sense of reality shattered as she encounters bizarre, otherworldly spaces, haunted by a twisted monster.
Maya's message was clear — ""can't leave til you find it"" — but what is it that Anita is really looking for?

An all-new, modern Silent Hill experience, powered by the latest in game technology, now available free to play exclusively on PlayStation® 5.

title: Stellar Blade Gameplay Showcase and Overview | State of Play 2024
description: During PlayStation's January 2024 State of Play, we got an in-depth look at Stellar Blade. The overview showed off its post-apocalyptic world, its inhabitants, some of its real-time hack and slash action, and gear. Stellar Blade is expected to release April 26, 2024.

title: SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS - Official Announce Trailer | State of Play January 2024
description:
Shadow the Hedgehog is back with Classic and Modern Sonic in SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS, an all-new collection featuring two unique experiences!
 
Play as Shadow the Hedgehog in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen powers and abilities that prove why he’s known as the Ultimate Life Form!
 
SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS also includes a complete remaster of the classic hit SONIC GENERATIONS, featuring newly remastered versions of iconic 2D and 3D stages with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.
 
SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS is coming to PlayStation®5 and PlayStation®4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, STEAM, and Epic in Autumn 2024!

title: Stellar Blade Official Pre-Order Trailer | State of Play January 2024
description:
Reclaim Earth For Humankind in Stellar Blade
Save humanity from extinction in this electrifying story-driven action adventure.

Stellar Blade releases on April 26th!

title: BATMAN is always watching in Suicide Squad 👀🦇
What Happened to Batman? Exhibit Tour In Suicide Squad Game Explains
description:
In Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League, Metropolis is home to a completely interactive Batman museum that not only recaps the events of the Arkham trilogy, but explained what happened to Batman after the ending of Arkham Knight. This video is a complete tour of that experience.
#gaming #suicidesquad #gamespot

title: 10 Things I Wish I Knew Before Starting Like A Dragon Infinite Wealth
description:
Infinite Wealth is a massive RPG that is easily gonna run you 50-100 hours. I want you to get your most of our time with this fantastic game and so I have compiled some helpful tips!

#gaming #LikeADragonInfiniteWealth #gamespot

title: Persona 3 Reload Review
description:
Persona 3 Reload succeeds in elevating an unforgettable story with smart combat changes and drastically improved visuals.

#persona3reload #persona #gamespot
